title: TERMS AND CONDITIONS
Purpose: This section introduces the legal agreements governing the use of the iTunes Store and related services.

title: ITUNES STORE, MAC APP STORE, APP STORE AND IBOOKS STORE TERMS OF SALE
Purpose: This section details the payment obligations and refund policies for purchases made through the stores.

title: PAYMENTS, TAXES, AND REFUND POLICY
Purpose: This section outlines the user's payment responsibilities and the refund procedures applicable to their purchases.

title: GIFTS
Purpose: This section specifies the rules and conditions governing the purchase and redemption of gifts from the stores.

title: IMPORTANT SAFETY INFORMATION
Purpose: This section provides health and safety recommendations for users of the products offered through the stores.

title: PRIVACY
Purpose: This section states that the service is subject to Apple's Privacy Policy and outlines how user data is handled.

title: CONTENT AVAILABILITY
Purpose: This section explains that iTunes reserves the right to change the availability of content at any time without notice.

title: USE OF CONTENT
Purpose: This section clarifies that users are granted a license to use iTunes products with specific usage limitations.

title: USAGE RULES
Purpose: This section outlines the specific rules governing the usage of iTunes products including limits on distribution and playback.

title: CONTENT SECURITY
Purpose: This section prohibits unauthorized actions against the security framework protecting iTunes products.

title: SERVICE SECURITY
Purpose: This section emphasizes the importance of accessing the service only through authorized software from Apple.

title: TERMINATION
Purpose: This section outlines the conditions under which iTunes may terminate user accounts and access to the service.

title: DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES; LIABILITY LIMITATIONS
Purpose: This section disclaims warranties and limits iTunes liability concerning the use of the service.

title: MISCELLANEOUS
Purpose: This section outlines the general provisions of the agreement between you and iTunes, including the governing laws and compliance requirements.

title: REQUIREMENTS FOR USE OF THE STORES
Purpose: This section specifies the eligibility requirements and conditions that must be met to access and use the Stores.

title: YOUR ACCOUNT
Purpose: This section describes the responsibilities of account holders regarding account security and management.

title: AUTOMATIC DELIVERY AND DOWNLOADING PREVIOUS PURCHASES
Purpose: This section explains how auto-download features work for previously purchased Eligible Content on associated devices.

title: AUTOMATIC DELIVERY OF UPDATES
Purpose: This section states that updates for applications may be automatically downloaded and installed on your devices.

title: PRIVACY
Purpose: This section indicates that the Stores are governed by Apple's Privacy Policy regarding user data.

title: USE OF PRODUCTS AND THE STORES
Purpose: This section defines the licensing agreement between the user and publishers regarding the use of purchased Products.

title: CONTENT SECURITY
Purpose: This section outlines the prohibitions against tampering with the security framework of the Products.

title: STORE SECURITY
Purpose: This section states the conditions under which users can access the Stores and prohibits unauthorized access.

title: SUBMISSIONS TO THE STORES
Purpose: This section details the responsibilities and potential liabilities associated with user-generated submissions to the Stores.

title: THIRD-PARTY MATERIALS
Purpose: This section clarifies iTunes' lack of responsibility for third-party content and materials available through the Stores.

title: OBJECTIONABLE MATERIAL
Purpose: This section acknowledges that users may encounter objectionable material while using the Stores and limits iTunes' liability.

title: INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
Purpose: This section affirms the ownership of intellectual property by iTunes and the Publishers and restricts unauthorized use.

title: TERMINATION
Purpose: This section outlines the conditions under which iTunes may terminate the agreement or user accounts.

title: DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES; LIABILITY LIMITATIONS
Purpose: This section limits iTunes' liability and outlines the circumstances under which it does not guarantee uninterrupted service.

title: CHANGES
Purpose: This section states iTunes' right to modify the agreement and outlines the implications for users if they do not accept changes.

title: FURTHER MAC APP STORE AND APP STORE TERMS AND CONDITIONS
Purpose: This section introduces additional terms that govern the use of specific products within the Mac App Store and App Store.

title: LICENSE OF MAC APP STORE AND APP STORE PRODUCTS
Purpose: This section details the licensing agreements for products available through the Mac App Store and App Store.

title: IN-APP PURCHASES
Purpose: This section describes the process and rules governing in-app purchases within applications downloaded from the Stores.

title: IN-APP SUBSCRIPTIONS
Purpose: This section outlines the rules and conditions for subscription-based services offered through the App Store.

title: MAC APP STORE PRODUCT USAGE RULES
Purpose: This section specifies the usage rules for products acquired from the Mac App Store, distinguishing between personal and commercial use.

title: APP STORE PRODUCT USAGE RULES
Purpose: This section details the usage rules for products from the App Store, covering personal and commercial use scenarios.

title: MAC APP STORE AND APP STORE PRODUCT MAINTENANCE AND SUPPORT
Purpose: This section clarifies the responsibilities of iTunes and publishers regarding maintenance and support for their respective products.

title: Limitation of Liability
Purpose: This section outlines the circumstances under which the Licensor is not liable for any loss or damage.

title: LICENSE OF IBOOKS STORE PRODUCTS
Purpose: This section details the licensing arrangement between the user and the Publisher of iBooks Store Products.

title: IBOOKS STORE PRODUCT USAGE RULES
Purpose: This section specifies the rules governing the personal use of iBooks Store Products.
